greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the smallest nonzero number that is not a substring of n in decimal representation.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a261794 x = f $ tail a031298_tabf where
then f css else foldr (\d v -> 10 * v + d) 0 cs
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 01 2015
